description:
June 15, 2017 / Addendum host D. Watkins is joined by Undisclosed: The Killing of Freddie Gray host Marcia Chatelain, as well as guest panelists Monica Bell, Wesley Lowery and Jessica Jackson Sloan.
 
Episode scoring music by Patrick Cortes, Ramiro Marquez, Blue Dot Sessions, and FMG Dez.
